entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
